title: Easy Brunswick Stew
directions: Trim roast and cut into 2-inch pieces. Stir together all ingredients except potatoes in a 6-quart slow cooker.

Cover and cook on LOW 8 to 10 hours. Add potatoes and cook for 1 hour, or until potatoes are tender. Remove pork with a slotted spoon, and shred. Return shredded pork to slow cooker, and stir well. Ladle stew into bowls.
ingredients: 3 pounds boneless pork shoulder roast (Boston Butt)
3 medium-size new potatoes, peeled and chopped $Click to see savings
1 (18-ounce) bottle barbecue sauce $Click to see savings
1 (9-ounce) package frozen baby lima beans, thawed
